name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Quinoa
description: Perfectly seasoned grilled chicken breast served with fluffy quinoa. The classic athlete's meal with high-quality protein.

instructions.instruction: Rinse quinoa and cook with 2 cups water for 15-18 minutes.
Make marinade: Mix 2 tbsp olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Butterfly chicken breasts or pound to even thickness for even cooking.
Coat chicken thoroughly in marinade. Rest for 10-15 minutes.
Heat grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side. Internal temp should reach 74°C (165°F).
instructions.tip: Don't press the chicken - it releases juices.

instructions.instruction: Rest chicken for 5 minutes before slicing.
Steam broccoli and halve cherry tomatoes.
Fluff quinoa with a fork. Serve with sliced chicken, broccoli, and tomatoes.
Drizzle with remaining olive oil and serve.

tips: Chicken breast is the leanest protein source.
Quinoa contains all 9 essential amino acids - complete protein.
Perfect for meal prep - slice and store for 4 days.
Resting the meat allows juices to redistribute.
storageInfo: Refrigerate in an airtight container for up to 4 days. Slice when ready to serve.
servingSuggestion: Serve with lemon wedges and a green salad.
variations: Use brown rice or bulgur instead of quinoa.
